title: Decisional State Checkpoint (DSC) Input Metrics Schema
description: Defines the mandatory structure and type constraints for S-01 (Trust) and S-02 (Risk) metrics supplied to the L4 Decisional Calculus for P-01 evaluation.

S01_Trust_Efficacy.description: Calculated Efficacy Projection value (S-01). Must meet or exceed the dynamic SCR threshold.

S03_Compliance_Veto_Status.description: Mandatory FALSE status for policy compliance. Sourced from RSAM/CIL.

Origin_Source_Artifact.description: Reference hash or ID of the L3 Proof Manifest (PMH-V1) artifact.

Timestamp_UTC.description: Cryptographically verifiable timestamp of metric generation.
